author: timbeiko
content: Working on the 4844 milestone doc now, and wondering if there's an explicit commit on the EIP we want to target (and release on the CL side?

author: timbeiko
content: Previously, we had agreed to include the modulus output for the precompile and the dependency on withdrawals, and specifically excluded eth/68 and disabling blob txn gossip. Is that still what we want to aim for?

author: timbeiko
content: Similarly, on the CL side, the two only "pending" PRs we had discussed (both now merged) were #3052 (Rebase on Capella) & #3089 (Blob retrieval by root). Should we instead target the latest/next release of the specs?

author: timbeiko
content:
Took a first stab at putting together the milestone tracker for the devnet: https://notes.ethereum.org/@timbeiko/4844-devnet-3 

Feedback welcome if you think something is wrong / could be phrased better!
